_instruction: Add these entries to the 'engagementChecks' array in data/infrastructure/health-config.json

newChecks.name: Journey Pills Visible

newChecks.impact: Users cannot see or start journeys
newChecks.inspect: npx playwright test -g 'journey pills are visible'

newChecks.name: Journey XState Transition Works
newChecks.impact: Journey click causes crash or no response
newChecks.inspect: npx playwright test -g 'journey click triggers XState'

newChecks.name: Simulation Journey Visual
newChecks.impact: Visual regression in simulation journey flow

newChecks.name: Journey Completion Tracking
